Text: Plz seed & btw thx for the share :)
Can someone seed this please. we're stuck at 99.7%. Thanks. And thanks for the share.

Been seeding this to & from for the last half year (although I bought the DVDs anyway, they were so cheap ;-) I play with VLC and have had no problems whatsoever, so it's bound to be in your installation somewhere. (B.t.w., the last episode, the Voice is missing from this set, but can be found somewhere on Mininova.)

Been shelling out around a factor of ten for the 2525 torrents the last half year, but I'm leaving in a week or two. Hope someone else takes up some kind of long-term committment. Cleopatra is fun ;-)
